product_name: Novara Ferndale Quilted Bike Jacket - Men's
long_description: A warm bike jacket with an urban sensibility, our men's Novara Ferndale Quilted jacket uses recycled Primaloft insulation to conserve core heat and keep you warm in the saddle on chilly days.
short_description: A warm bike jacket with an urban sensibility, our men's Novara Ferndale Quilted jacket uses recycled Primaloft insulation to conserve core heat and keep you warm in the saddle on chilly days.
